## ConcurrentDecoderFacade.getWorkerSet() method

Returns a \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\] instance based on the script URL specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getWorkerSet(scriptUrl?: string, workerCount?: number): ConcurrentWorkerSet;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scriptUrl | string | The optional URL with the workers' script. If not specified, the function uses \[\[defaultScriptUrl\]\] instead. |
|  workerCount | number | The number of web workers to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

ConcurrentWorkerSet
